title: Don't Eat the Snow in Hawaii
description: Magnum's old Navy buddy is dead and the Navy says he was a cocaine smuggler. Magnum sets out to prove his buddy was framed.

title: Don't Eat the Snow in Hawaii: Part 2
description: Magnum continues to learn about the framing of his dead Naval pal. He looks for a female drug dealer, an Arab gold buyer and a mobster.

title: China Doll
description: Magnum is hired to protect "The Soul of Soong," an ancient Chinese vase, until it can be delivered to its owner.

title: Thank Heaven for Little Girls and Big Ones Too
description: Five little schoolgirls from Vermont ask Magnum to find their missing teacher.

title: No Need to Know
description: Magnum is hired to protect a British Brigadier who is hunted by the IRA.

roles.char: Brigadier General Alistair Ffolkes, Royal Army

title: Skin Deep
description: Magnum investigates the suicide of a beautiful actress who killed herself with a shotgun.

title: Never Again... Never Again
description: Magnum helps two elderly Jewish Holocaust survivors who are being pursued by Nazis.

title: The Ugliest Dog in Hawaii
description: Magnum is tasked with guarding "Sir Algernon Farnsworth," a wealthy socialite's dog.

title: Missing in Action
description: Magnum is hired by a new singer at the King Kamehameha Club to find her fiancé who is listed as MIA during the Vietnam War.

title: Lest We Forget
description: A man nominated to be a Justice on the U.S. Supreme Court asks Magnum to find a woman he last saw on December 6, 1941.

title: The Curse of the King Kamehameha Club
description: A Kahuna places a curse on Rick and the King Kamehameha Club.

title: Thicker Than Blood
description: TC flies out to a freighter at sea during the night to smuggle a Marine deserter back to the U.S.

title: All Roads Lead to Floyd
description: Magnum is hired by a woman from Kansas to find her father who she has not seen for ten years.

title: Adelaide
description: A woman hires Magnum to protect "Norman," a prized show horse who may be kidnapped.

title: Don't Say Goodbye
description: Agatha Kimball, a wealthy blind woman, is being blackmailed and she hires Magnum to pay the blackmailer.

title: The Black Orchid
description: A rich, bored woman, married to one of the richest men in Hawaii, hires Magnum to act out some of her "games," but then the "games" become reality.

title: J."Digger" Doyle
description: Thieves are attempting to steal tapes of Robin Masters' new book. Magnum joins forces with security expert J. "Digger" Doyle to prevent the theft.

title: Beauty Knows No Pain
description: A woman from Bayonne, New Jersey hires Magnum for one day to find her fiancé.

title: Billy Joe Bob
description: Texan Billy Joe Bob Little hires Magnum to find his sister, Carol Ann, who was a nightclub singer before going missing.

title: Dead Man's Channel
description: A young college student hires Magnum to find her father, an archaeologist. His boat was found adrift in Nehoa Channel, an area that local Hawaiians believe is cursed and non-Hawaiians should not enter.

title: The Woman on the Beach
description: Sara Clifford committed suicide in the Summer of 1945 by driving her car off a cliff. Rick meets a woman dressed in white named Sarah in the King Kamehameha Club but when they go for a walk on the beach, the woman disappears.

title: From Moscow to Maui
description: A defected Russian pilot named Yuri Dolgof hires Magnum to get his fiancée Nina, a member of the Soviet track team to defect as well.

title: Memories Are Forever
description: Magnum thinks he's spotted his one true love Michelle, the woman he married six years earlier during his last tour in Vietnam and thought to have been lost in a bombing raid. As he becomes more and more desperate to find her, he is suddenly and suspiciously recalled for active Navy duty and ordered to testify in Washington.

title: Tropical Madness
description: Jennifer Chapman, a young English rose takes a liking to Higgins. Naturally, Magnum suspects her of being after something.

title: Wave Goodbye
description: Magnum's friend Kacy, an ex-surfboarding champion, is found dead on the beach and TM investigates to find the murderer.

title: Mad Buck Gibson
description: The infamous daredevil and author 'Mad' Buck Gibson parachutes into Robin Master's estate for a visit. Joan, one of his ex-wives, hires Magnum to keep an eye on Buck to make sure she collects her alimony. Although Magnum can't stand the idea of being a babysitter, Gibson leaves a trail of destruction behind him that sees both Higgins and Rick end up in hospital.

title: The Taking of Dick McWilliams
description: Dick McWilliams, an old military buddy of Magnum's has been kidnapped. Dick's Japanese wife Mitsu ask TM to drop the ransom without informing the police or her father, who never approved of the marriage in the first place.

title: The Sixth Position
description: Kendall Chase, a prima ballerina, is staying at the estate as a guest of Robin Masters. Magnum is tasked with being her bodyguard after an incident in New York City.

title: Ghost Writer
description: Virginia Fowler is ghost writing the autobiography of the elusive, wealthy eccentric Harold Farber. She hires Magnum after her apartment is ransacked and her notes and tapes of the book are stolen.

title: The Jororo Kill
description: Kate Sullivan, a reporter that Magnum, TC and Rick met in Vietnam, wants Magnum to find a former British MI6 strategist who dropped out of sight to write a book and may be arriving in Hawaii.

title: Computer Date
description: Magnum is searching for a spy who's been selling computer information from a large corporation. The president of the company tells him he suspects his wife of having an affair and asks him to follow her. Magnum is distressed to find her having an intimate dinner with one of his best friends, Rick.

title: Try to Remember
description: The Ferrari, with an unconscious and injured Magnum in it, is found at the bottom of a cliff. Magnum is rushed to a hospital but when he regains consciousness is found to have amnesia and cannot remember what happened.

roles.char: Parking Attendant, at Crouching Lion Inn

title: Italian Ice
description: Magnum goes to Sicily at the request of Robin Masters to rescue a friend's daughter who was being held by mobsters. Tom rescues the girl and brings her back to the estate and then trouble occurs.

title: One More Summer
description: Someone is trying to kill professional football quarterback Dorsey Bramlett who was the backup quarterback for Magnum at the U.S. Naval Academy. Bramlett contacts Magnum and asks Tom to be his bodyguard.

title: Texas Lightning
description: Magnum is hired by Jeannie Lowry as a bodyguard while she plays high-stakes poker on a yacht.

title: Double Jeopardy
description: Magnum returns from California and finds a Hollywood crew on the estate filming a movie based on a Robin Masters' novel. When the star's double is injured, Magnum is hired as his replacement.

title: The Last Page
description: A Vietnam veteran from Seattle hires Magnum to find his girlfriend who came to Hawaii and then disappeared.

title: The Elmo Ziller Story
description: Someone is trying to murder Elmo Ziller, Higgins' illegitimate half-brother from Texas. Elmo has brought his rodeo to Hawaii and Magnum is asked to protect him.

roles.char: Sylvia, the Desk Clerk at the Belvedere Club

title: Three Minus Two
description: Jan Kona and her two partners operate a very successful fashion company. When one of the partners is murdered, Jan asks Magnum to protect her.

title: Did You See the Sun Rise?
description: Magnum, TC and Nuzo had escaped from a North Vietnamese POW camp during the Vietnam War. Nuzo returns to Hawaii and tells TC that the brutal Russian Colonel who was at the camp has returned to the U.S. and is going to kill him.

title: Ki'is Don't Lie
description: The Poison God's Ki'i, a wooden Polynesian God image, was found in a cave in Hawaii. Unless it is returned to the cave, anyone who comes in contact with it will die.

title: The Eighth Part of the Village
description: Higgins sends Magnum to the docks to pick up a crate of books but instead of books, he finds a young Japanese woman in the crate.

title: Past Tense
description: TC's helicopter is skyjacked and he is forced to land in a local prison and help a prisoner escape.

title: Black on White
description: Higgins is quarantined in the guest house with Magnum because TM may have been exposed to a deadly African virus. Or, is it something else?

title: Flashback
description: Magnum wakes up one morning and finds he is back in 1936 and must solve a murder.

title: Foiled Again
description: Higgins is in a fencing match against a man he has hated for years.

title: Mr. White Death
description: A professional wrestler from the mainland asks Magnum to find his son.

title: Mixed Doubles
description: Magnum is tasked with protecting a young tennis pro who is being threatened.

title: Almost Home
description: Magnum helps a cocktail waitress from Cleveland who wants to place her father's remains on the battleship Arizona in Pearl Harbor.

title: Heal Thyself
description: A doctor that Magnum knew in Vietnam when she was an Army nurse is accused of murdering three patients in a Hawaiian hospital.

title: Of Sound Mind
description: Magnum inherits $50 million from a former client who died in a plane crash.

title: The Arrow That Is Not Aimed
description: A Japanese Samurai warrior brings an antique plate to Hawaii that Robin Masters had purchased. The Samurai is attacked, the plate is stolen and Robin wants TM to recover it.

title: Basket Case
description: TC and Magnum are each coaching a youth basketball team and a young girl joins TM's team.

roles.char: Ernie, the Driver of the Car

title: Birdman of Budapest
description: Robin Masters' high school English teacher is staying at the estate while she writes a book about birds.

title: I Do?
description: Magnum marries the niece of the company president in order to catch a thief.

title: Forty Years from Sand Island
description: Two Japanese-Americans who were interned on Sand Island in January 1942 witness two soldiers beating a fellow Japanese internee to death. This incident causes repercussions today.

title: Legacy from a Friend
description: The body of Magnum's friend, an experienced lifeguard, is found on a beach after an apparent drowning but TM does not believe he drowned.

title: Two Birds of a Feather
description: A single engine light aircraft being flow from California to Hawaii crashes in the tidal pool at the estate.

title: ...By Its Cover
description: Magnum meets an old Naval Academy buddy and ends up delivering marijuana.

title: The Big Blow
description: A hurricane is hitting Hawaii on the night of Robin Masters' spring equinox party.

title: Faith and Begorrah
description: Higgins' half brother, an Irish Catholic priest from Northern Ireland, arrives in Hawaii to confront a British officer who he claims stole an ancient artifact from his church.

roles.char: Desk Clerk, at Low Surf Hotel

title: Home from the Sea
description: It is July 4th and Magnum is off the coast on his surf ski when a speed boat shoots past him throwing TM into the water and the surf ski drifts away.

roles.char: Lieutenant Thomas Sullivan Magnum III, USN

title: Luther Gillis: File #521
description: Luther Gillis is a private investigator from St. Louis who was hired by the father of a 16-year-old runaway girl to find her. At the same time, Magnum was hired by the girl's mother to find her. Can they work together?

title: Smaller Than Life
description: Rick's old friend Waldo Norris is caught trying to break into a guarded building. Waldo claims he is working for an insurance company and is investigating the loss of a valuable figurine.

title: Distant Relative
description: Rick's 22-year-old sister Wendy arrives in Hawaii. Rick still believes that she is a young, innocent girl and asks Magnum to entertain her while Rick works at the club.

title: Limited Engagement
description: Investigating a series of convenience store robberies, Magnum also comes across a couple of elderly ladies, who live in a broken-down house with other elderly people who are being harassed by a no-good slum lord.

title: Letter to a Duchess
description: Higgins meets an English duchess who he was enamored with over the years.

roles.char: Vivien Brock Jones, Lady Wilkerson, Duchess of Whitt

title: Squeeze Play
description: Robin Masters' bets Buzz, a "girlie magazine" publisher, that the King Kamehameha Club softball team can beat Buzz's team.

title: A Sense of Debt
description: Magnum is in Detroit and TC is using the Ferrari. While driving the car, TC has an accident and injures a bare knuckles fighter and he has to take his place in the ring.

title: The Look
description: Holly Fox was a DJ in Vietnam admired by all the servicemen including Magnum, TC and Rick. While listening to the radio one day, Magnum hears a voice that he believes is Holly Fox.

title: Operation: Silent Night
description: It's Christmas time and TC is flying Magnum (dressed as Santa Claus), Rick and Higgins to three different islands. En route, TC is forced to make an emergency landing on an island that the Navy uses for gunnery practice.

title: Jororo Farewell
description: The Jororo Islands youth baseball team is in Hawaii to play TC'S All-Stars. The Jororo center fielder is 12-year-old Prince Danny who is a target of Jororian dissidents.

title: The Case of the Red-Faced Thespian
description: The "Great Gatsby Gala," with everyone dressed in 1920s costumes, is being held at the estate and Magnum is responsible for security.

title: No More Mr. Nice Guy
description: Assistant District Attorney Carol Baldwin was removed as prosecutor of a major criminal case and then fired. She enlists Magnum's help in finding evidence against the man she was prosecuting.

title: Rembrandt's Girl
description: A woman whose father was just released from prison approaches Magnum asking him to follow her father to ensure he does not commit a crime. Thomas ends up trapped in a bank vault with the woman.

title: Paradise Blues
description: Alexis, a famed singer that Magnum and TC knew in Vietnam, comes to Hawaii and asks Thomas to find a man who owes her $18,000.

title: The Return of Luther Gillis
description: Luther, and his secretary Blanche, come to Hawaii where Gillis is being given an award for his book.

title: Let the Punishment Fit the Crime
description: A woman from the mainland hires Magnum to find her brother who apparently joined a cult.

title: Holmes Is Where the Heart Is
description: Higgins is writing his memoirs about a former Sandhurst classmate who now thinks he is Sherlock Holmes.

title: On Face Value
description: While getting mixed up in a car chase with a couple of fencing suspects, Magnum is responsible for injuring an innocent bystander and brings her from the hospital to Robin's Nest.

title: Dream a Little Dream
description: Magnum takes on the case of an old friend who's a pro surfer with an ex-husband trying to kidnap their daughter.

title: I Witness
description: Higgins, Rick, TC and others are in the King Kamehameha Club when three burglars with guns demand money.

title: Echoes of the Mind: Part 1
description: Higgins is getting married and Magnum is hired by Diane Dupres who believes people are attempting to harm her.

title: Echoes of the Mind: Part 2
description: Deirdre Dupres, Diane's twin sister, arrives and tells Magnum the truth about Diane.

title: Mac's Back
description: Magnum is despondent over his loss of his wife Michelle, his father, Mac McReynolds and now Diane Dupres. While driving in Honolulu the next day, he sees a man who could be an identical twin for Mac McReynolds.

title: The Legacy of Garwood Huddle
description: Garwood Huddle, an infamous 1940s bank robber, escapes from a Hawaiian prison and asks Magnum to help locate his grandson who has been kidnapped.

title: Under World
description: TC is returning from Molokai when he encounters engine problems and crashes into the water just before landing.

roles.char: Desk Clerk at the Lahaina Hotel

title: Fragments
description: A psychic hires Magnum to investigate her murder.

title: Blind Justice
description: Carol Baldwin, the assistant district attorney, hires Magnum to investigate a man who allegedly murdered his wife.

title: Murder 101
description: Magnum is teaching a class in private investigation at a local college and the class decides to find the missing fiancé of one of the students.

roles.char: Shipley, Thug working for Mr. C
Mr. Spencer, the Bank Vice President

title: Tran Quoc Jones
description: A 10-year-old Amerasian boy, who is in the country illegally, asks Magnum to help him find his father.

title: Luther Gillis: File #001
description: Robin Masters asks Magnum to track down an embezzler working in a local bank. Meanwhile, Higgins is being blackmailed and since Magnum is busy, he recruits Luther Gillis to help him find the blackmailer.

title: Kiss of the Sabre
description: Magnum has been evicted from the guest house so that Betty Wyndom can write a mystery novel based on the character Sebastian Sabre.

title: Little Games
description: A Robin Masters' sponsored jewelry design competition is being held at the estate with over $170 million worth of jewelry on display and the insurance company sends Krista Villeroch to check on the estate's security.

roles.char: Police Officer John Lee, at the Police Station

title: Professor Jonathan Higgins
description: Higgins' cousin Sally arrives in Hawaii to get married and Higgins has a big surprise. Meanwhile, Magnum is helping Agatha recover $10,000 from a bankrupt investment.

roles.char: Gunman at the Tee Mar Office

title: Compulsion
description: Someone is harassing Assistant District Attorney Carol Baldwin and Magnum agrees to help her. Higgins is facing a reunion with his old Sandhurst classmates.

title: All for One: Part 1
description: Magnum, TC, Rick and Higgins volunteer to go to Cambodia to rescue two Americans.

title: All for One: Part 2
description: Magnum and Higgins are captured along with Tyler. Rick and TC rescue Magnum and the others, and a gun fight ensues. Freedom wins and everyone returns home.

title: The Love-for-Sale Boat
description: Mac sells Rick an expensive boat crewed by three beautiful Japanese women.

title: Let Me Hear the Music
description: Magnum is hired by a country and western singer who is looking for five songs written by his friend 30-years-ago.

title: Ms. Jones
description: Ms. Jones, the records clerk that Magnum always encounters, asks TM to find her missing husband.

roles.char: Caligula, the Dancer at Club U.S. Male

title: The Man from Marseilles
description: World famous French detective Jean Claude Fornier arrives in Hawaii and asks Magnum to help him find a missing heir.

title: Torah, Torah, Torah
description: A Torah is stolen from a rabbi who is Higgins' friend and Magnum volunteers to help recover it.

title: A Pretty Good Dancing Chicken
description: Assistant District Attorney Carol Baldwin's 17-year-old cousin is missing and Carol asks Magnum to help find her.

title: Deja Vu
description: Magnum and Higgins go to England to prepare Robin Masters' latest purchase, a castle, for a party. While there, Magnum looks up an old friend only to learn he is dead.

title: Old Acquaintance
description: Magnum is reunited with a former high school friend and they try to recover a kidnapped dolphin.

title: The Kona Winds
description: Magnum rescues a woman who attempted suicide and then strives to protect her from her husband.

title: The Hotel Dick
description: When he takes a job as a hotel detective, Magnum's attempts at catching a cat burglar preying upon guests are complicated by his relationship with a hooker who keeps getting him into trouble with both criminals and his boss.

title: Round and Around
description: TC's friend is killed during a store robbery and Magnum and TC set out to find the killers.

roles.char: Bert, one of the basketball players

title: Going Home
description: Magnum goes home to Virginia to attend his grandfather's funeral. And when a family heirloom goes missing he accuses his step father of stealing it to save his business.

title: Paniolo
description: Magnum is hired by a cattle rancher on the big island of Hawaii to catch cattle rustlers.

title: The Treasure of Kalaniopu'u
description: Robin Masters' publisher buries a chest containing $1 million on Oahu and a contest is held to find it. Magnum is tasked with protecting the woman who has the clues to the chest's whereabouts.

title: Blood and Honor
description: Magnum is recalled to active duty by a Navy admiral and tasked with finding a spy.

title: Rapture
description: While diving with TC, Magnum sees a young boy without diving gear who gestures Magnum to follow him.

title: I Never Wanted to Go to France, Anyway
description: Higgins' friend brings his carnival to Hawaii and Magnum is asked to find the murderer of one of the trapeze performers.

title: Summer School
description: Robin Masters' nephew "RJ" has been sent to the estate so Higgins can educate and teach the young man discipline.

title: Mad Dogs and Englishmen
description: Robin Masters has fired Higgins and Magnum is awaiting the arrival of his replacement.

title: All Thieves on Deck
description: Magnum, TC and Rick are aboard a cruise ship guarding a wooden Hawaiian family God statue belonging to Robin Masters.

roles.char: Isobel Dumout aka Countess Jacklyn Fabre Dumout

title: This Island Isn't Big Enough....
description: Rick is sailing a yacht with four male passengers when the boat is attacked by gunmen.

roles.char: US Coast Guard Officer, at Morgue
US Coast Guard Officer, at Dock

title: Way of the Stalking Horse
description: An insurance salesman from the Mainland hires Magnum to find his father who he has not seen in over 20 years.

title: Find Me a Rainbow
description: Magnum is hired by a rich young woman who wants him to find a former family chauffeur who stole a string of pearls, or that is what she says.

roles.char: P.I. Joe McKenna, in Los Angeles

title: Who Is Don Luis Higgins... and Why Is He Doing These Terrible Things to Me?
description: Higgins' life is turned upside down when a man claiming to be his half brother shows up at a Hawaiian Islands chess tournament.

title: A Little Bit of Luck... a Little Bit of Grief
description: Rick wins one million dollars on a game show and falls in love with a beautiful blond. Magnum and T.C. try to save the Little League team's clubhouse.

title: Photo Play
description: A woman who is writing a book about road signs hires Magnum because someone is following her and attempting to steal something but she does not know what it is.

title: L.A.
description: Magnum is in Los Angeles serving a writ when he meets a woman who is later murdered. Magnum sets out to find the killer and possibly finds his soulmate.

title: One Picture Is Worth
description: A deaf woman witnesses a bank robbery where four people are murdered. Magnum agrees to act as her bodyguard after the murderer is released on bail.

title: Straight and Narrow
description: Lesley, the prostitute Magnum met while working as a hotel detective, is back and she asks Thomas for help in finding her sister.

title: A.A.P.I.
description: Magnum is being awarded the Local PI Of The Year Award when the presenter, French detective Jean Claude Fornier, collapses and dies. Thomas, aided by several other PIs, sets out to find the murderer.

title: Death and Taxes
description: A psycho killer calls Magnum and gives him clues to the next victim.

title: Little Girl Who
description: Michelle, Magnum's wife, is back and she asks Thomas to take care of her daughter.

title: Paper War
description: Magnum and Higgins engage in an all out prank war leading to Magnum finally accusing Higgins of being Robin Masters.

title: Novel Connection
description: In this crossover episode featuring

title: Kapu
description: Magnum saves the life of a native Hawaiian girl who witnesses a hit. Wounded in the getaway, Magnum is nursed back to health on the forbidden island of Kapu.

title: Missing Melody
description: T.C. faces his worst nightmare when his daughter is kidnapped.

title: Death of the Flowers
description: Magnum helps Carol investigate whether her mentor, Judge Hannibal Kearns, is in trouble. Rick plans a birthday party for Icepick.

title: Autumn Warrior
description: Higgins takes three boys from a juvenile jail on a survivalist weekend on a deserted island.

roles.char: Young Higgins, in World War II

title: Murder by Night
description: 1940's Magnum investigates the murder of a newspaper publisher in a classic whodunit mystery.

title: On the Fly
description: Magnum's attempts to secure a pilot's license in order to land a job in Oklahoma are put on hold when T.C. is shot, and it turns out that the bullet was meant for Magnum.

roles.char: Art, the Civil Air Patrol Pilot

title: Solo Flight
description: Magnum goes on a soul-searching trek after a being terminated from a case he couldn't solve. His trip leads him to the top of a mountain where he spotted an old plane crash from WWII, only to be pinned under the fuselage, leg bleeding, and trying to keep from going delirious when he can't free himself.

roles.char: Lieutenant Thomas Sullivan Magnum II, USN, Magnum's Father
Tommy Magnum as a Boy in the 1950s

title: Forty
description: Magnum's 40th birthday is approaching and he is hired to locate a Chinese gang "shaking down' local merchants.

title: Laura
description: Frank Sinatra, in his last major acting role (he planned to appear on "Magnum, P.I." again the following season, but Tom Selleck's scheduling conflicts forced the producers to cut back the episodes and Sinatra's turn never came) casts him as a retired New York cop who learns that his beloved granddaughter was kidnapped and murdered by incredibly vicious sexual predators during his retirement celebration. Sgt. Doheny eventually tracks the two killers to Hawaii and enlists Magnum's help without telling him why he wants to find the men. One of the killers flees Doheny and is run over by a bus. In a quiet, intense way, Doheny describes the killing to Magnum and makes it perfectly clear that he will kill the other murderer if he finds him, no matter what the circumstances. Magnum goes along hoping to find the killer first and spare Doheny from a murder rap.

roles.char: Doheny's partner & speaker at the retirement

title: Out of Sync
description: Cynthia Farrell, the woman Magnum fell in love with while in Los Angeles, is visiting but Thomas is involved with Andrea who claims that someone is going to kill her.

title: The Aunt Who Came to Dinner
description: Magnum's favorite aunt, famous playwright Phoebe Sullivan, comes to Hawaii and asks Thomas to protect her from someone trying to kill her.

roles.char: Lani the Maid at Robin's Nest

title: The People vs. Orville Wright
description: Rick confesses and is jailed for the murder of a "hit man."

title: Limbo
description: Magnum is shot in a warehouse and is left for dead. He then "sees" but cannot communicate with Higgins, Rick, TC, Carol, Michelle, et al.

title: Infinity and Jelly Doughnuts
description: Magnum is in a coma after he was shot in a warehouse and his mother, Higgins, TC, Rick, Carol and a priest are with him hoping he regains consciousness.

title: Pleasure Principle
description: In a switch, Higgins becomes irresponsible and acts like Magnum while Magnum acts and dresses like Higgins.

title: Innocence... A Broad
description: Magnum finds himself with some unwanted but beautiful help in a case involving Robin Masters being named in a lawsuit.

title: Tigers Fan
description: Lieutenant Tanaka is murdered and Magnum sets out to find his killer.

title: Forever in Time
description: Magnum keeps seeing a woman who looks like a Hawaiian princess who died in 1910.

title: The Love That Lies
description: Magnum is hired by a woman to find the child she gave up 30 years ago.

title: A Girl Named Sue
description: A woman hires Magnum claiming that her brother killed their father and stole his will. At the same time, the brother hires Susan Johnson, the woman Thomas was locked in a bank vault with and is now a P.I., to investigate his sister.

title: Unfinished Business
description: Quang Ki, the man who shot and almost killed Magnum and wants to kill Michelle and Lily Catherine, is on trial for attempted murder when the case is suddenly dismissed.

title: The Great Hawaiian Adventure Company
description: Magnum has developed a great idea for a new business while TC's son is in Hawaii and running with a motorcycle gang and getting jailed.

roles.char: Budge, the leader of the biker gang

title: Legend of the Lost Art
description: Higgins asks Magnum to find a long-lost artifact, "The Lost Art of the Ancients" before it can fall into the wrong hands.

title: Transitions
description: The manuscript of Robin Masters' latest novel is stolen and Higgins enlists Magnum's help in retrieving it. Magnum is assisted by Luther Gillis who arrives on vacation.

title: Resolutions: Part I
description: Magnum returns to Virginia on vacation and reflects on his life, his marriage to Michelle and his experiences. He hastily returns to Hawaii when TV reporter Linda Lee Ellison is attacked.
